definitions.definition: An instance of segueing, a transition.
To move smoothly from one state or subject to another.
definitions.example: I can tell she’s going to segue from our conversation about school to the topic of marriage.

definitions.definition: To make a smooth transition from one theme to another.
definitions.example: Beethoven’s symphonies effortlessly segue from one theme to the next.

definitions.definition: (of a disk jockey) To play a sequence of records with no talk between them.
